§eTri-Karma Backlash §a§lHold RMB§r

§dSkandha's Curse§r
When an entity with this effect take damage, it takes extra damage depending on its max health. This damage negates effects such as resistance and absorption.
§7Max health ~50 = §c10% §7of max health
Max health 51~100 = §c5% §7of max health
Max health 101~250 = §c2% §7of max health
Max health 251~ = §c1% §7of max health
